reviewText: This is a full collection of every episode.  The quality of the dvds is excellent, picture and sound.  Thank you!!!
My daughter really loves the Saddle Club series.  She would recommend this to all girls who love horses.  The series is very well priced.
My twelve year old is picky on what she likes to watch and this product has kept her entertained for hours watching these!!
My daughter loves this series, she watches them over and over!! It is a good series for a young lady of 8-12
This is a great series for girls between the ages of 8-12.  Another series that we love as well for 10-14 is Free Reign.
My daughter loved these and watched them over and over.

Used to  read the books when I was a kid  Really enjoyed  the book so much  that when I was in six grade I start horseback riding  Took classes so I was 16 years old Also Used to watch the show on Disney Channel  Would recommend this DVDs  Anybody  Who has a kid  or kids in their class interested in horseback riding
Great stories! My eight year old daughter loves watching!

This is a heck of a steal. I purchased this elsewhere for my niece. It cost around $15 more.

The series is a cute one, especially for horse crazy girls. The acting is good, the cinematography is excellent for a kid's series. All in all, this is a good deal for a good series.
Don't buy unless you never really want the item
well, i don't really love it, but my 9 yr old girls sure do!  watch them over and over and over.
My daughter loves this series. It provides great entertainment that is age appropriate.
